title: Demi Vollering Doubles up in Style at La Vuelta Femenina with Assured Solo Attack
content:
2024 winner back in the Vuelta red jersey, dropping Reusser, Van der Breggen and others on first summit finish.

Read the full article at Demi Vollering Doubles up in Style at La Vuelta Femenina with Assured Solo Attack on Velo.
author: sstokes
